name: I Was GLAD to meta U
author: Dokkanlinks
notes: Switched between rez, phoenix, setteled on glads. This build felt inconsistent but it performed alright for laddering purposes i did enjoy the over all look of it however. Uses the basic glad skeleton swapping  murmillo,beastiary and laquari for their respective techs. Vortex tropper was there to reshuffle any unwanted glads, swapped an econ for kuriboh.
